message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Could you consider that?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $13,000. This product is truly top-quality and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I understand that the product is high-quality, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,000?
